## What is this and why does it exist?

This package, **pprl**, implements a method for performing
Privacy Preserving Record Linkage. This linkage can be done
locally or through Google Cloud Platform.

## Where do I go now?

If you're looking to get stuck in with pprl, head over to our
[tutorials](docs/tutorials/index.qmd).

For more focused, technical details of how this all works, see our
[API reference](docs/reference/index.qmd).
